Name: Dr. VISU
Hod_message: I feel privileged to lead a team of talented and experienced faculty members. AI & DS is the most conspicuous technology transforming the facet of industry and mankind. This course is specially designed to enable students to build intelligent machines, software, or applications with a cutting-edge combination of Machine Learning, Deep Learning, Analytics, and Visualization technologies.

Our department aims to produce skilled professionals in the domain of AI and DS and enable them to excel professionally. It also provides state-of-the-art laboratory facilities to the students to get better practical exposure and strong ties with industry, research organizations, and the community at large.
designation: Professor and Head, Dept of Artificial Intelligence and Data Science

Name: Dr. A. Mohamed Sikkander
Hod_message: As the Head of the Chemistry Department, I am thrilled to share our vision, mission, and values that drive our pursuit of excellence in education, research, and innovation. You are part of a dynamic community dedicated to solving complex chemical and environmental challenges. Our department is committed to providing a world-class education, cutting-edge research opportunities, and a supportive environment that fosters creativity, innovation, and leadership. I encourage you to explore the vast possibilities of engineering chemistry, build a strong foundation in theoretical and practical knowledge, and engage in research, internships, and industry collaborations to gain hands-on experience. Networking with peers, faculty, and industry professionals will help you forge lifelong connections, while curiosity and a proactive mindset will drive your success. With experienced faculty, state-of-the-art facilities, and extensive resources, we are here to support your academic and professional journey. Together, we can build an inclusive and vibrant community passionate about engineering chemistry and dedicated to making a positive impact on society.
